[Global Namespace]

Global namespace.

Types
HUD_NUM
enum HUD_NUM {...}

Flags used by custom numeric displays.

Values
HUD_NUM_RIGHT_ALIGN

(65536) Draw right aligned element.

HUD_NUM_SEPARATOR

(131072) Draw separator.

HUD_NUM_DONT_DRAW_ZERO

(262144) Hide the element if the value is zero.

HUD_NUM_LEADING_ZEROS

(524288) Draw leading zeros.

HUD_NUM_NEGATIVE_NUMBERS

(1048576) Allow negative values.

HUD_NUM_PLUS_SIGN

(2097152) Draw sign for positive values.
